tool_description: Constructs optimized SQL queries with support for complex conditions, joins, aggregations, and parameterized statements.

query_type.description: Type of query: SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE

table_name.description: Primary table name for the query

error_messages: Invalid query type: Use one of [SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE]
Empty table name: Provide a valid table name
Missing required columns: Specify columns for SELECT queries
usage: Specify query_type and table_name. Add columns, conditions, and joins as needed. The tool generates optimized SQL with parameterized values.

sql_query.description: Generated SQL query with parameter placeholders

query_explanation.description: Human-readable explanation of the query logic
